turn prev assignment rmd into pasias one

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
filename <- "heightfoot.Rmd"
```

```{r}
v <- readLines(filename)
v %>% 
  str_replace_all("\\\\question", "## xxx title here\n\n") %>% 
  str_replace_all("\\\\endnote", "xxx ^[") %>% 
  str_replace_all("\\\\bP", "") %>% 
  str_replace_all("\\\\eP", "") %>% 
  str_replace_all(" *\\\\p", "(a)") %>% # count these?
  str_replace_all("\\\\bS", "xxx Solution\n") %>% 
  str_replace_all("\\\\eS", "\n$\\\\blacksquare$\n") %>% 
  str_replace_all("^ +", "") %>% 
  writeLines("xxx.Rmd")
```

open in R Studio

```{r}
rstudioapi::navigateToFile('xxx.Rmd')
```
